'Context: Disease mature B-cell neoplasm associates Gene LPP.. Variant rs12195582 associates Disease mature B-cell neoplasm. Variant rs4938573 associates Disease mature B-cell neoplasm. Variant rs2647012 associates Disease mature B-cell neoplasm. Variant rs61835088 associates Disease cocaine dependence.. Variant rs2629540 associates Disease cocaine dependence. Variant rs2825295 associates Disease cocaine dependence. Disease cocaine dependence associates Gene FAM53B. Disease cocaine dependence associates Gene FAM78B. Compound (1S,2S,6R,14R,15S,16R)-5-(cyclopropylmethyl)-16-[(2S)-2-hydroxy-3,3-dimethylbutan-2-yl]-15-methoxy-13-oxa-5-azahexacyclo[13.2.2.12,8.01,6.02,14.012,20]icosa-8(20),9,11-trien-11-ol treats Disease cocaine dependence. Disease ontology identifier of cocaine dependence is DOID:9975. Disease cocaine dependence isa Disease drug dependence. Disease cocaine dependence presents Symptom Memory Disorders. Disease cocaine dependence localizes Anatomy brain. Disease cocaine dependence presents Symptom Language Development Disorders. Disease drug psychosis resembles Disease cocaine dependence. Disease cocaine dependence presents Symptom Dyskinesia, Drug-Induced. Disease cocaine dependence presents Symptom Hallucinations. 
Provenance and symptom information are not relevant for identifying gene or variant associations in this context. 
Diseases with related organs or biological mechanisms often share genetic markers, indicating common risk factors. 
Genetic associations signify known links between specific genes or variants and disease risk, with certain variants highlighting susceptibility in specific populations. 
Statements like "Disease associates Gene" or "Variant associates Disease" represent established genetic connections, where gene or variant subtypes may indicate specific risk factors.

Question: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with mature B-cell neoplasm and cocaine dependence. Given list is:  TLR1, SLC14A2,  SCN1A,  IL12RB2, PLG'
